suites.title: File Upload Authorized Page Validation: validate UI implementation

tests.title: should validate main page elements
tests.fullTitle: File Upload Authorized Page Validation: validate UI implementation should validate main page elements
tests.code:
cy.contains('h2', 'Upload Bank Statement').should('be.visible');
cy.contains('h2', 'Upload Company Ledger').should('be.visible');

tests.title: should validate Bank Statement Section
tests.fullTitle: File Upload Authorized Page Validation: validate UI implementation should validate Bank Statement Section
tests.code: cy.get('div[role="presentation"]').should('contain.text', 'Choose file').and('have.css', 'border-color', 'rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.5)');

tests.title: should validate Company Ledger Section
tests.fullTitle: File Upload Authorized Page Validation: validate UI implementation should validate Company Ledger Section
tests.code: cy.contains('Upload Company Ledger').parent().find('div[role="presentation"]').should('contain.text', 'Choose file').and('have.css', 'border-color', 'rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.5)');

tests.title: should validate format requirements : CSV
tests.fullTitle: File Upload Authorized Page Validation: validate UI implementation should validate format requirements : CSV
tests.code:
cy.contains('Supported format: CSV').should('have.length', 1);
cy.contains('Maximum size: 2MB').should('have.length', 1);

tests.fullTitle: File Upload Authorized Page Validation: validate UI implementation should validate header elements for a logged in user
